achieves.from sentence: Our proposed model achieves a new SOTA on RE with a F 1 of 62. 83 , more than 2.3 F 1 above the previous SOTA .

also beats.from sentence: Our proposed model also beats a multitask model which uses signals from additional tasks by more than 1.5 F 1 points .

Recall gains.from sentence: The Recall gains for RE ( 4.3 absolute points ) are much higher than for EMD ( 0.6 absolute points ) .

showcase.from sentence: Thus , our large gains in RE Recall ( and F 1 ) showcase the effectiveness of our simple modeling of ordered span pairs for relation extraction ( Section 3.3 ) .

both tasks.from sentence: For both tasks , our model 's Precision is close to and Recall is significantly higher than previous works .
